name: Match rates for married and nonmarried doctorate recipients, by sex
description: Match rates for married and nonmarried doctorate recipients, by sex

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: This table represents matches after applying the validation and filtering steps. There are a few matches who did not have a reported gender in the SED, they were assigned the gender male for this analysis. The p values were calculated using the t-test. The match rate is defined as the proportion of SED doctorate recipients who were included for matching and who were matched to UMETRICS.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates, AYs 2014–17; Institute for Research on Innovation and Science, UMETRICS, 2020 release data.
